ygData.subject: Hello all
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone, my name is Kirsten and I have two characters on Everquest.  One of my character is a level 6 High Elf wizard called Kerowen and the other one
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone, my name is Kirsten and I have two characters on
Everquest. One of my character is a level 6 High Elf wizard called
Kerowen and the other one is a level 4 High Elf cleric called Trinty.



"Wizards and Clerics are by far the best class in EverQuest and we all
know that High Elves rule the world."
